text: hananim-i maliaui adeul ye sula malhaneun geudeul-ege jeojuga iss eulila eoneu nugudo hananim-ui beol eul magji moshalini geubun-ui tteus-ila myeon maliaui adeul-in yesuwa geuui eomeoniwa sesang-ui modeun geos-i myeolmang hage doenola cheonjiui gwonneung-i hana nim-ege iss-eumyeo geu saiui samlaman sang-i geubun-ui geos-imyeo tteus-i iss-eul ttae changjohasini hananim-eun modeun il-e jeonjijeonneunghasinila
